price: 160. excepto los siervos que adoran sinceramente a Al-lah y a quienes ha escogido (para concederles Su misericordia, pues estos no Le atribuyen nada que no se corresponda con Su magnificencia).

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.
